text: DeSaad (also spelled Desaad) is a fictional supervillain. He appeared in books published by DC Comics. He is one of the followers of Darkseid from the planet of Apokolips. == Fictional character biography == DeSaad is Darkseid's master torturer. At one point, DeSaad had an assistant named Justeen. == In other media == Steve Byers played DeSaad in the television series Smallville. The character made his cinematic debut in Zack Snyder's Justice League (2021), by Peter Guinness. ==References== Category:DC Comics supervillains Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1971
